description: The explosive device discovered by divers near Guernsey's St Peter Port Harbour has been destroyed.
title: WW2 bomb in Guernsey detonated by Royal Navy divers
title_page: WW2 bomb in Guernsey detonated by Royal Navy divers - BBC News
maintext: Lt Cdr Al Magill, commanding officer of the Royal Navy's Southern Diving Group in Portsmouth, said: "This is the first of that type we have dealt with in a number of years, and although it was overgrown it was still intact."
